sentences.english: Commando force joined up with the airborne troops near the captured bridge.
sentences.chinese: 突击队和空降部队在被占领的桥梁附近汇合。

sentences.english: The commandos blackened their faces with charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 那名突击队员用木炭把他的脸涂黑。

sentences.english: Chen Tianfang see the situation is critical, led by the Cang wolf commandos launched rescue operations.
sentences.chinese: 陈天放眼见形势危急，率领苍狼突击队展开营救行动。

sentences.english: It is the primary "heavy" gun carried by SEALs on patrol.
sentences.chinese: 它是海豹突击队在巡逻时主要使用的重型武器。

sentences.english: The commandos attacked the outpost at dawn.
sentences.chinese: 突击队员于拂晓时袭击了前哨基地。

sentences.english: North Korean commandos are not expected to survive such attacks.
sentences.chinese: 此类攻击后，北朝鲜突击队预计不会有人活着。

sentences.english: Black fox commandos Wang Fu guests wen-yuan wang reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 王富贵和王文渊重建黑狐突击队。

sentences.english: Daring rescue. Navy Seals free the captain in the Maersk Alabama, killing three pirates.
sentences.chinese: 美军海豹突击队狙杀三名海盗，成功营救货船船长。

sentences.english: They will need a half-hour to disarm them.
sentences.chinese: 突击队需要半小时来解除这些雷。

sentences.english: Commandos stormed luxury hotels where terrorists had taken guests hostage.
sentences.chinese: 突击队冲进了恐怖分子劫持人质的几家豪华酒店。

sentences.english: Players control Darwin, the G-Force team leader, and housefly surveillance commando Mooch .
sentences.chinese: 玩家控制达尔文，G力组长，监察突击队央求家蝇。

sentences.english: In order to assist the commandos, the east China sea dragon to body is to die, driving a car stopped kawasaki.
sentences.chinese: 为了协助突击队，东海龙以身赴死，开车拦住川崎。

sentences.english: The commando force joined up with the airborne troops near the captured bridge.
sentences.chinese: 在被占领的大桥附近，突击队和空降部队汇合了。

sentences.english: The rangers joined other special troops to try to free Israelis taken hostage by several gunmen.
sentences.chinese: 特别突击队员和其他特种部队成员试图解救这些人质。

sentences.english: The assault element, led by Captain Ramirez, opened up from their right flank.
sentences.chinese: 拉米雷斯上尉率领的突击队从他们的右翼开火。
